titleStmt.title: Letters of publication, of a commission under the great-seal: anent the security of the peace of the highlands of Scotland.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrw Ander-son ...,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms with initials C R on t.p.; initial letter.

Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
